issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Remove unnecessary references to namespace in executor
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12435](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12435). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There is no need to support multiple executor clusters from a scheduler, so the namespace of an executor is implicitly defined by the scheduler it connects to. See <https://the-asf.slack.com/archives/C01QUFS30TD/p1618679585211100> for more context
